attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.

attributes.description:
2014 AUDI Q7 3.0 TDI QUATTRO S-LINE, BLACK PACK, 7 SEATER, 110 000 KM’S PARTIAL SERVICE HISTORY WITH MAJOR SERVICE JUST COMPLETED, R 389 950.00, THIS IS AN AMAZING VEHICLE. 
If you are in the market for a beautiful family sized SUV, you have to consider the Audi Q7, if you need to tow anything or need a car for family holidays, please come through and see this car. You will be very impressed with everything it offers and how well it drives. 
We sell a lot of these and there is a good reason for that, they are good reliable luxury SUV’s. If you like a bit of power in your diesel engine then you will enjoy this car, the drive is smooth and power effortless, we have found them to be reliable and the problems that do turn up over time in our experience are not major and easily repaired. 
These cars are also fantastic on diesel if you drive her nicely, you really do get the best of all 3 worlds: power, fuel efficiency and comfort. It’s also obviously the Quattro which means you get AWD making it a very nice SUV to drive anywhere.
WHAT MAKES THIS CAR SPECIAL? 
•	Spare keys
•	All Wheel Drive 
•	Panoramic glass sliding roof 
•	Push button boot open 
•	Smash and grab safety film 
•	Tow bar 
•	All four tyres are in excellent condition
•	7 seater 
•	Full S-Line package
•	Full Black pack with red callipers 
WHAT WAS WRONG WITH THIS CAR WHEN WE BOUGHT IT?
•	We had noticed this vehicle when it came in it must have had some previous cosmetic paintwork done to it, it wasn’t up to our standard so we had to respray the following panels: Drivers door, left rear fender, front bumper. 
•	Scratches were also noted on the bonnet and left rear door, these were also resprayed. 

CONCLUSION
This is a great car to own, it’s certainly got the looks and it’s also a 7 seater diesel auto with AWD (All wheel drive).
